item.title: Differentiating GP Versions with Custom Icons
item.description: I work with many different customers who use various versions of Dynamics GP, ranging from GP 9 to GP 2010 R2. While most rely on the core modules, some utilize Project Accounting, and a few work with Analytical Accounting. This setup requires me to maintain multiple GP versions across several virtual servers. A minor inconvenience I’ve encountered is the identical icons for GP 10 and GP 2010. This makes it challenging to differentiate between them in the start menu, taskbar, and desktop when both versions are installed on the same server.
